tag_list: cody-christian, web-developer, software-engineer, cpc, cody-p-christian, cpc-studios, techstars
overview:
Cody is best known as a starter, a geek and a generalist. He loves to build things, whether it be a great friendship, amazing software, or a great business. When people tell him he can’t do something then he sets out to prove them wrong. Cody is brutally honest, and expects the same from others. He lives by your word is your bond, don’t live it down. He’s a dreamer, although he rarely has them. Cody tries to not take anything for granted. Oh, and one day he wants to move to San Francisco, California.

A few things Cody does: “Web Application Developer, Entrepreneur, and Multimedia Guru. Interested in lightweight, robust Web Apps. Also interested in Web App niche markets. Have managed production servers, and websites with significant traffic. On the side, I do audio recording and video production for events with professional software and equipment, as well as professional photography and processing.”
